ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: "Players and Pawns" Part 1 of 6: While the Baroness chooses between love and duty, Cobra Commander and Destro make bold moves to secure their own positions. Meanwhile, Snake Eyes returns to face the repercussions of his drastic decision, the Joes have a graduation ceremony and some fresh faces join a new campaign against Cobra's forces. All this and Sierra Gordo under siege in Part 1 of the first full-length story arc!
